short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds a button on a page that scrolls to the top.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension adds a scroll-to-top button to web pages, which allows users to easily return to the top of the page without having to manually scroll.
